user_input_query: How do I reset my password?
ai_response: Use the corporate portal Settings to reset your password.
reference_output: Use the corporate portal > Settings > Reset Password.

user_input_query: How can I check my PTO balance?
ai_response: You can check your PTO balance by opening Workday -> Time Off -> View Balance.
reference_output: Open Workday > Time Off > View Balance page.

user_input_query: Where do I update my direct deposit info?
ai_response: Update direct deposit under Workday Pay, Payment Elections.
reference_output: Go to Workday > Pay > Payment Elections to update direct deposit.

user_input_query: What is the performance of Broadcom this year?
reference_output: Broadcom annual performance increased 4% year over year.

user_input_query: How do I create a new ticket in ITSM?
ai_response: In ITSM, open Create Request and fill the form.
reference_output: Open ITSM > Create Request and fill in ticket details.

user_input_query: How can I access my pay stubs? My email is janedoe@acme.com
ai_response: Go to Workday Pay, open the Payslips section.
reference_output: Go to Workday > Pay > Payslips to download pay stubs.

user_input_query: Where do I find the security training modules?
ai_response: Open Learning Hub, Compliance, then Security Training modules.
reference_output: Open Learning Hub > Compliance > Security Training modules.

user_input_query: How do I request new hardware?
ai_response: Submit a Hardware Request form in ITSM Procurement.
reference_output: Go to ITSM > Procurement > Hardware Request form and submit.

user_input_query: How did our quarterly revenue compare to last year?
reference_output: Quarterly revenue increased 5% year over year.

user_input_query: Where do I download the latest VPN client?
ai_response: Use the Tools Portal VPN page to download the client.
reference_output: Open Tools Portal > VPN page to download latest client.
